template.name: variables
template.description: Manage variables template (date, number and weather)

date.description: Manage date : timezone, cron, format, start...
date.format: Set how the date should be displayed

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: Number of digits after the decimal point

description.cron: Set the schedule (cron) for when the variable should be updated
description.step: How much to add to the variable

start.date: First date that will be used

description.location: Enter the location for which you want the weather.

set.success: The weather settings have been saved successfully.

weather.name: weather
weather.description: Get the weather for a given city / default template city

error.locationConflict: Only one location can be used at the same time.
error.noLocation: A location is mandatory for event.
error.pastAnchorDate: The start_date `{{anchor}}` is in the past.

language.name: language
language.description: Change the lang of the bot

locale.description: Set the default locale for date
locale.name: locale

timezone.set: The default time zone has been set to {{tz}}.

schedule.name: schedule
schedule.description: Manage cycles events based on duration

create.name: create

count.description: Number of different events (labels and descriptions)

bloc.name: bloc
bloc.description: Interval between the start of successive events (e.g., 2d, 48h)

create.start: Local time at which each event starts

list.name: list
list.description: List actives cycles and upcoming events

pause.id: ID of the cycle to be paused
pause.name: pause

cancel.name: cancel
cancel.description: Delete a cycle and its future events.

vocal.name: location_channel
vocal.description: Set a channel location (stage or voice)

modals.description: Some placeholder can be used, see docs for more information.

scheduleEvent.nextPrompt: Event {{current}}/{{total}} saved as `{{label}`. Preparing next event...

image.label: Banner
image.description: Optionnal image banner for the event

scheduleEvent.completedQuick: The event `{{scheduleId}}` has been planned correctly! Please wait a few minutes before viewing.

pause.success:
‚è∏Ô∏è Cycle **{{scheduleId}}** paused.
It will no longer generate new events, but events that have already been created will remain.

cancel.success:

errors.unauthorized: This modal is not for you.
errors.wizardNotFound: Wizard state not found or has expired.
